events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer role. Our team will review your credentials and get back to you soon.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department as a Software Developer candidate. We will proceed to assign a recruiter shortly.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile and will contact you soon to schedule an initial screening interview.
The initial screening interview was successfully completed. The candidate showed strong technical knowledge and enthusiasm for the role.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to our interview follow-up, expressing eagerness to move forward to the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled successfully for April 10th. The candidate has confirmed availability for this important step in the hiring process.
The technical interview was completed today, showcasing the candidate's strong coding abilities and problem-solving skills relevant to our engineering team.
An HR interview has been scheduled for April 15th to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and other important details related to the Software Engineer position.
